meanings.definition: An alkaloid found in peyote cactus (Lophophora williamsii). It has sedative and muscle-relaxant properties.
meanings.english_definition: An alkaloid found in peyote cactus (Lophophora williamsii). It has sedative and muscle-relaxant properties.

examples.sentence: Anhalonine is one of the many psychoactive compounds present in peyote.
examples.translation: アンハロニンは、ペヨーテに含まれる多くの精神活性化合物の一つです。

etymology.value: Derived from Anhalonium, a former genus name for peyote cactus.
